description:
- Revised and Updated for June 2016 -

Did you know that Amazon had over $107 billion revenue in 2015 and that ~45% came from third party sellers just like you and I.

The e-commerce industry is expected to grow to $1.67 trillion in 2015, up by 20.9 percent, eMarketer estimates.

Would you LIKE to tap into the most lucrative business model currently available online by leveraging the power of fast growing company like Amazon?

Are you TIRED of chasing the “next BIG thing" while watching others with real businesses make money?

Are you READY to develop a scalable business by selling real physical products no matter where you live in the world?

Let me introduce myself, I am Damir and on behalf of WinWinAcademy I am going to teach you exactly how you too can launch a new eCommerce business partnering with Amazon.

Let them do all the dirty work including inventory handling, picking, packing, shipping, managing refunds, payment transactions, technology support and most of the customer service.

You are going to focus on what matters the most to every business:

  • Finding great product opportunities and market gaps
  • Sourcing high quality products 
  • Doing ninja marketing campaigns that will establish your brand as a premium in your niche and make people pay extra for it

There is no need to spend a fortune on Amazon selling courses, when you can use that money to invest in inventory and business launch!

This course is structured in a step-by-step way. 

Every section and lecture adds to the previous one, showing you only highly actionable steps that you can implement right away!

Whether you're an advance marketer or a computer newbie, I am going to hold you by the hand and guide you step-by-step through the entire process of creating private label brands:

- from setting up your account to picking a product

- finding suppliers

- labeling your products for FBA

- launching your product

- managing, automating and outsourcing the entire Amazon business.


Here's what you'll learn:

► How to setup your Amazon seller account THE RIGHT WAY (very important!) from anywhere in the world

► The Most Lucrative Business Model Right Now– Private label marketing: How to add value and get people to pay far more for your products

► The HOTTEST Niches on Amazon Right Now – How To Analyze Markets and Win Every Time

► Finding, Evaluating, Selecting your First Profit Making Product

► Find High Margin, Quality and Reliable Suppliers That Will Support Your High Growing Amazon Business. Domestically and overseas.

► How to SAVE on Inventory order and NOT Make an Inventory Investment

► Letting Amazon do all the Work – Your Automated Fulfillment System

► Creating a HIGH CONVERTING Product Page – Adding your products, Titles that sell, Copywriting Secrets, Images that Convert, Keyword Optimization (Amazon SEO)

► Powerful & Proven Product Launching Strategies

► 100% legitimate ways to get large number of VERIFIED REVIEWS

► How to provide exceptional customer support by adding value to the conversation

► The Big Trick to Maintaining a High Seller Rating - How to remove negative seller feedback REVEALED!

Extra bonuses worth over 200$ (NOT AVAILABLE IN OTHER COURSES):

► Support under 24 hours

► Pre-researched list of great product opportunities that you can start right now

► Online calculators developed just for your Amazon business, so you can see exact profit margins before you even source a product

► Supplier cheat sheet – what to ask suppliers

► Due diligence checklist - how to distinguish fraud and legitimate suppliers

► FREE analysis of your product listing with improvement suggestions


BIG DISCLAIMER! This is not a get rich quick scheme or anything similar, if you expect to earn substantial amount of money overnight then please don't take this course. Like in any business in order to succeed you will need to commit time, energy and be ready to take calculated risks. This proven system will help you kick start your Amazon business much faster. Follow the course, take massive action and you can expect to launch your first products in several weeks from now.

I am so confident that this approach of teaching works that I offer FULL NO-QUESTION Asked 100% Unconditional Ironclad Money Back Guarantee! And the best part?? You can keep all the resources FOREVER (calculators, cheat sheets, eBooks).

Don't get left behind! Adsense and AdWords had it's golden time, Bitcoin also… but Amazon's time is NOW!

Develop a business you're going to be proud of!

Click “Take This Course" button in the top right corner of this page and how to sell products on amazon profitably!

Talk to you inside :)
title: Amazon FBA as Private Label Business Launching Platform
